Hi GURUs/List-members,
In my Junit framework, input is given as XML to the server-side TIBCO 
BusinessWorks process, and the test runs ok. But in a different case, 
when SOAP message sent over JMS is used in the XML, the server side 
TIBCO BusinessWorks process does not accept XML input. Error msg
says: there was error deserialising/processing SOAP message. What 
could be the reason? This SOAP over JMS message was taken off from
the queue using queuebrowser and pasted in TextPad text editor and 
saved as XML file. I suspect, in this procedue, something is causing 
problem, and this SOAP/XML is rejected by the TIBCO process.

I have spent over a week breaking my head over it. Any help will be 
greatly appreciated.
PLEASE HELP.

Victor
